name: Egg McMuffin™
description: Our signature toasted English muffin with butter, a freshly cracked egg and a slice of melted Cheddar cheese.

name: McMuffin™ Bacon & Egg
description: An English muffin with crispy bacon slices, a freshly cracked egg and melted Cheddar cheese.

name: Double McMuffin™ Pork DeLuxe

name: Breakfast McWrap™ – Pork & Egg

name: Breakfast McWrap™ – Chicken & Bacon
description: Crispy chicken strips, bacon, cheese, tomato and salad in a warm tortilla with creamy sauce.

name: Hash Brown
description: Golden‑fried potato patty: crispy outside, fluffy inside.

name: Big Mac®
description: Two 100 % beef patties, special Big Mac sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles and onions in a three‑piece sesame bun.

name: Quarter Pounder® with Cheese
description: A quarter‑pound* beef patty seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper, topped with two slices of melted cheese, onions, pickles, mustard and ketchup.

name: Double Quarter Pounder® with Cheese
description: Two juicy quarter‑pound* beef patties with melty cheese, slivered onions, tangy pickles, ketchup and mustard on a sesame seed bun.

name: Hamburger
description: Simple classic: 100 % beef patty, pickles, onions, ketchup and mustard in a soft bun.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Hamburger plus a slice of melted cheese.

name: Double Cheeseburger
description: Two beef patties, two slices of cheese, onions, pickles, ketchup and mustard.

name: McDouble®
description: Two seasoned beef patties with a single slice of cheese, pickles, onions, ketchup and mustard.

name: Premium Crispy Chicken Classic Sandwich
description: Crispy breaded chicken breast fillet, fresh lettuce and creamy mayo in a sesame bun.

name: McChicken®
description: Classic chicken patty with lettuce and McChicken sauce in a toasted bun.

name: Chicken McNuggets® (6 pieces)
description: Six tender chicken breast nuggets, golden‑fried and perfect for dipping.

name: Chicken McNuggets® (10 pieces)
description: Ten golden‑crisp nuggets made from 100 % chicken breast meat.

name: Filet‑O‑Fish®
description: Fish fillet in a light batter with tangy tartar sauce and half a slice of cheese.

name: Bacon Ranch Salad
description: Crisp iceberg & romaine mix topped with shredded cheddar, crispy bacon pieces and a creamy ranch dressing on the side.

name: Southwest Salad

name: French Fries (Small)

name: French Fries (Medium)

name: Side Salad

name: Apple Slices
description: Fresh chilled apple wedges—an easy on‑the‑go snack.
